choices: Catra (even though she's not a princess)
1.content: Which of the princesses are diapered?
1.title: Who's diapered?

12.content: Why is she in diapers?
12.title: Catra (even though she's not a princess)

122.content: Does she start haveing accidents.
122.title: Other

122222.content: Is she diapered at a house in the woods?
122222.title: No

1222221.content:
The mission was to find and kill a enemy informant that was hiding in the forest, simple enough. Little did catra and her unit know that the informant was well aware of their coming and set up a surprise for them. Only catra manged get survive the ambush and was now covered in mud wondering the forest. "I'm dead. I failed the mission and lost the hole unit." She said.

It was almost dark when Catra came to the edge of the clearing, at the center of it was a small house with a garden in the front. there was a women on her knees with her back toward Catra working in the garden. Catra slowy creeped toward the women. When Catra was about four feet form her
the women stood up and turned around.

The women had black hair tied into a braid and was wearing a green dress that came down to just above her ankles."Oh, hi there" the women say with a surprised tone upon seeing Catra.

"Hi" Catra replied.

"You look like you've had a ruff day." The women said looked Catra up and down.

"You could say that." Catra sighed.

"Well why don't you come in and get a bath and some thing to eat." The women said as she picked up a basket of vegetables and started walking to the house."My names Sue by the way, whats your's?" she said over her shoulder.

"Catra" she said following Sue.

They entered the living room of the house, to the right it opened into a kitchen, there was a hallway to the left, straight forward there was a couch and fire place.

"Stay here for a moment while I get you some clothes" Sue went down the hallway and came back with a stack of clothes. "You get cleaned up while in make dinner, the bathroom is the one straight down the hall."she said handing the clothes to Catra and walked in to kitchen.

Catra walked down the hall pass two other doors straight across from each other. She went into the bathroom set the clothes on the counter, took a bath. After she was clean and dried herself off she put on the clothes. The underwear were pink, covered in flower designs, thicker than any pair she had seen before, and made a slight crinkleing sound as she slipped them on. The shirt she was pink, and she was given a pair of overalls that ended just above the knee. When she looked at herself in the mirror she when red with embarrassment.

Catra went into the kitchen to see Sue adding vegetables to a pot "Just sit down at the table it almost done" Sue said.

At the table there were three chairs. Two were normal but the other was an adult sized highchair.

Which one does she sit in?
1222221.title: Yes

12222211.content:
"Wierd" Catra said under her breath and sat down in one of the normal chairs. Sue set a bowl in front of Catra. "What is it" she said sniffing it.

"Soup" Sue said as she began eating.

Catra glareing at Sue slowly began eating. After a few minutes of Catra spoke up "So do you live here alone or what?"

"I have guest from time to time but I'm alone most of the time."

"And whats with this thing." Catra asked pointing at the highchair.

"Thats for my guest."

"Ok" Catra said and looked down at her soup. After they were done with there meal Catra let out a loud yawn and said " Well I need to get going" and got up and started to leave.

"Its already dark why don't you spend the night."

"Why not" Catra said shruging.

"Great " Sue said grabing her hand and leading her toward the hallway. They went into one of the rooms. Their was a dresser and a chest along one wall and the other wall had a crib and a changeing table. Sue went over to the dresser opened one of the drawers and pulled out a pair of footie pajamas and helped Catra into them. She went to the crib and droped the gate, and Cartra climbed in to the crib, Sue closed in behind her. "Goodnight" she said and turned of the light as she left the room. Catra slowly falls asleep as she thinks about she strange day.

Does she wake up wet?
12222211.title: Normal  chair

122222111.content:
"Wake up kitten" Sue said as she shook Catra awake. Catra yawed and rubbed her eyes as Sue helped her out of the crib. Sue stripped off Catra pajamas. "Looks like someone needs a change."

"What are taking abo..." Catra went red with embarrassment went she noticed the cold clamenss between her legs. Sue picked her up, carried her to the changing table, and lied her on it. Sue took Catra's pullup of, wiped her crotch, powered and taped a thick diaper on her. After she was done she dresses Catra in...
122222111.title: Yes

1222221111.content:
Sue helped Catra off the changing table, and walked to the wardrobe. Catra looked down at her new bright pink underwear. After a few seconds Sue came back "Arms ups". Catra compiled without look up. She felt something being slipped over her hands and head. After Catra's head emerged she saw the thing in question was a pink poofy dress.

"Perfect" Catra said rolling her eyes.

"Let's get you some breakfast" Sue said as she picked Catra up and carried her out of the room and into the kitchen. When they were in the kitchen Sue sat Catra in the...
1222221111.title: A pink dress

14.content: How many Princesses wear diapers?
14.title: Multiple

choices: A day in the life of X Princess.
Maybe when Glimmer first got Adora into diapers?
145.content:
All of the Princesses of Eternia wear diapers. For varying reasons of course.

Adora wears them mainly because she was roped into it by Glimmer, but has come to enjoy them.

Entrapta often wears diapers just to circumvent having to stop what she's working on.

Netossa and Spinnerella both wear diapers, but no one is quite sure what their exact reason is.

Frosta wears diapers due to her young age, it allows her to attend meetings and gatherings without having to stop for bathroom breaks, not to mention, due to the Princesses getting closer and finding out they all have a liking for them, she's been using them more liberally.

Glimmer wears diapers purely because she enjoys them, she also enjoys helping her friends to get into them as well~

Perfuma wears diapers because she finds them to be comfortable, though she only wears cloth ones, and almost always insists on changing as soon as she's soiled them.

Mermista wears diapers simply for the convenience of not having to go to the bathroom normally, to the point where she doesn't even mind getting changed out in the open or in front of others for simplicity's sake, she too usually wears cloth diapers.

Scorpia mostly wears diapers because like Adora, she was roped into it after finding out pretty much every Princess wears them. So she typically doesn't get as into using them as the others, but she's pretty into everyone else wearing them, finding it so very cute.

What will you do with this information? Where are we anyway?
145.title: All of Them!

info.brief_description: The princesses of She-Ra 2018 are finding their way back to diapers!
info.description:
The princesses of Etheria are finding their way back to diapers! How and why is up to you as you journey through the story!

Keep everything age appropriate Rated General to Teen Rating! No deaths or sexual content, but everything else is fair game!
